tab1.app_text:
This is your first login to the app.
To begin your setup process, press *Next*.
tab1.crypto_text:
This is your first time in the app.
To continue with the onboarding, press 'Next'.

tab2.app_text:
What sets MoneyStats apart from other money management apps is that you don’t need to track every daily expense.
Simply input *Stats* once a week or, preferably, once a month to get the most out of the features.
tab2.crypto_text: Create or import your crypto wallet, add your assets by completing the form, and get details, stats, and much more.

tab3.app_text:
Almost all features of the app are interactive.
After entering the Dashboard, start by creating a new Wallet.
Once you’ve added new *Stats*, you can view graphs and tables with all the details.
tab3.crypto_text: Manage holding or trading operations in the transactions section.

tab4.app_text: It’s time to get started! Press *Try Now* to access the Dashboard and discover all the features.
tab4.crypto_text: Press 'Try Now' to access the dashboard.

login.title: Log In
login.subtitle: Fill the form to log in

warning.password:
Warning: Your password must meet the following criteria:

  • Must be 8 to 10 characters long.
  • Must contain at least one uppercase and one lowercase letter.
  • Must include at least one number and one special character from the following: @$!%*?&.,
To ensure the security of your account, make sure your password meets these criteria. A strong password is essential to protect your personal data and online privacy.

info_app.title: Registration Info
info_app.text:
To register for the MoneyStats app, you need an invitation code. If you don't have one, you can request it from Giovanni in the Contacts section. In the meantime, you can explore the app using the following credentials:
• Username: moneystats
• Password: moneystats
This account provides a preview of the app interface. Please note, you will not be able to modify or add new data.

report_bug.title: Report Bug
report_bug.subTitle: Tell us more about the issue
report_bug.titleBugSub: Write a short title for the bug
report_bug.text: Please tell us what you were doing when the error appeared.

close_operation.title: Close Operation
close_operation.subTitle: You are about to close the current trading operation. Verify and confirm the exit price and quantity. If you notice discrepancies or wish to make changes, click 'Edit'. Once confirmed, proceed with closing.

info.operation_details: Adding an operation allows you to invest FIAT currency into Crypto by selecting the 'New Investment' option. You can also open a Holding operation, which involves transferring between Stable Coin and Crypto (or vice versa), or initiate a Trading operation, which lets you open and close transactions between Stable Coin and Crypto, with relevant statistics.
info.investment_details: In this section, you can add a new investment from your personal wallet (there is no need to specify the wallet) into your Crypto Wallet. A new operation will be registered, and the current asset will be updated or added.
info.holding_details:
In this section, you can perform a Holding operation.
Select the Asset you want to use for the investment from your wallet and the Asset you want to purchase.
The system will automatically calculate the percentage of invested money transferred to the new account.
You can always modify the balance and invested amount in the 'Asset Details' page within the wallet list.
info.trading_details: The Trading section of MoneyStats allows you to execute trading operations directly from your wallet. You can exchange Stablecoins and Cryptocurrency via an intuitive and secure interface. Transactions are monitored in real-time, and for better management, open operations can be viewed and closed in the Resume section of the app.
info.close_operation_details:
You are about to close the current operation. In this section, you can confirm or modify the essential details before finalizing the operation.

Operation Details:
  • Exit Price: This is the price at which you intend to sell the asset. Ensure it aligns with your expectations and the current market conditions.
  • Quantity: This is the amount of the asset you intend to sell. Ensure it matches the amount you actually hold.

If you believe there are discrepancies in the above data or wish to make changes, click to update the operation details.

Once you are satisfied with the information entered, you can proceed with closing the operation. Remember to act cautiously and make informed decisions.
info.transfer_details: In this section, you can easily transfer your assets from one wallet to another. Choose the destination wallet, select the desired crypto asset, and set the amount you wish to transfer. You can also define any fees to ensure a quick and secure transaction. Make sure to carefully verify all the details before confirming the transfer.
info.app_category_details: Transactions are grouped based on the latest available monthly stats, providing an aggregated view by category.

operation_exchange_page.warningBalance: The entered balance exceeds the maximum available amount
operation_exchange_page.warning: Asset not found in the current wallet. Add a new asset and deposit balance from a new investment to proceed.
operation_exchange_page.select: Select the wallet to receive the asset
operation_exchange_page.empty_wallets: There are no wallets available. Add a new wallet to proceed with the transfer.

data.changelog:
· Migration of services to Oracle Cloud.
· Bug fixes.

· Added Crypto section.
· Updated the add and edit wallet sections.

· Improved loading performance using cache.
· Enhanced account management with token auto-refresh, extending session duration beyond one hour.
· Fixed an issue in the edit wallet feature that set all wallets as Crypto.
· Resolved issues with TradingView data in wallet details.

· Fixed an error in Add Stats with balance set to 0.
· Improved error handling.
· Fixed an error in Add Crypto Stats when the wallet contains no assets.

· Fixed a cache error with live wallets.
· Improved overall performance.
· Enhanced security measures.
· Resolved an issue in the Crypto Resume section when data was missing.
· Added validation rules for email and password and improved the authentication screen.

· Updated the server to the latest available version, improving stability and security.
· Upgraded the server to the most recent version for an optimized user experience.
· Unified the charting system with a single library, improving data retrieval and visualization.
· Implemented a new cache management system to increase efficiency and loading speed.
· Optimized overall performance, reducing response times and enhancing responsiveness.
· Each page is now independent and no longer depends on the main dashboard, offering greater modularity.
· New login system via Access-Sphere, with advanced security measures to protect access to the app.
· Added Google Login support, allowing users to sign in quickly and securely using their Google accounts.
· Added integration with Google Cloud for smoother and more scalable operations.
· Implemented new cryptocurrency statistics, including real-time price tracking, market trends, and historical data analysis.
· Improved translations and text for a clearer and more localized user experience.
· New animations and effects to make the user interface more dynamic and interactive.
